betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This is the begining of the tech tree of HBM's Nuclear Tech Mod. Before proceeding it is recommended that you stock up on materials such as iron, coal, aluminium, copper and redstone.

It is also worth noting that some advanced machinery can be obtained by salvaging them from structures scattered across the world, such as Centrifuges from abandoned nuclear powerplants found in deserts, or by rare mob drops such as a Geiger Counter.

Note:

A few quests are not part of NTM and are simply there for added utility and qol.
